channel.title: GSOC on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in GSOC on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: First GSOC blog post!
item.description: Welcome to my first GSOC blog post! Google Summer of Code (GSOC) 2020 has been going for a couple weeks now and I thought it would be fun to share what progress has been made so far. If you’re just joining now you should know that the first month or so is the ‘Community Bonding Period’. During this time the student developers get to know their community, establish expectations, and set recurring check-in meetings.

item.title: PhD Year 1 Semester 2 Recap and Summer Plans
item.description: Going to keep this update brief as I will be doing a lot more blogging this summer (more on that later)! This semester was incredibly challenging. Probably the hardest semester of work and school I have ever countered. Yet as things in life tend to do, everything came together at the finish line. Class projects, research expectations, and personal goals. I completed the first stage in the doctoral process at UMD - the Comprehensive Portfolio.
